## RestMethodMiddlewares interface

Contains rest middleware types that will be used, decorator can add type if it wish to be used

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RestMethodMiddlewares extends TypedPropertyDescriptor<any> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> TypedPropertyDescriptor&lt;any&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [middlewareTypes](./rest.restmethodmiddlewares.middlewaretypes.md) | Type&lt;[RestMiddleware](./rest.restmiddleware.md)<!-- -->&gt;\[\] | Array of rest middleware types that will be used |
